Articles.Content:
Had a look and could not see anything on this. When I start in career mode there is no action group in the VAB editor - is this something that appears when I get round to updating the VAB. This was a clean install and I did a manual patch just in case

Thanks

Yes. I can't quite recall exactly which upgrade it is, but one of the VAB upgrades will allow you to modify action groups

You'll still have access to the standard action groups until then, though. (i.e., brakes, gear lights, extending/retracting landing gear or lander legs, etc., all triggered with their default keys.)
Thanks - Use them for Goo etc at the start - will press on:-)
